backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage mixins, access control, data models for users, deals, buyers, contracts, payments, analytics, and Stripe configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app component with startup state machine, authentication gating, profile loading, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access‑denied message with optional back navigation using card UI components.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Renders deal analysis results including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating with styled UI components.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Top-level layout managing navigation, mobile menu, lazy-loaded pages, and logout behavior based on user profile.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with reset handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s key details with edit action, contact info, budget, and preferred areas.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, updating, and deleting buyers with form fields and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays contract documents for a deal with status, errors, and download actions.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles selecting, validating, and uploading contract files with progress tracking and type selection.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows summary info for a deal including address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting deals with form fields mapped to backend data and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a lock screen for gated features with upgrade prompt based on required membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart summarizing closed profit and estimated fees from deals.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueOverlays.t: Provides wrappers for dialog, sheet, and select content that enforce opaque backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Generic error state component with retry, secondary actions, and optional contact support button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Profile setup dialog that collects user info and saves it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table showing total profit grouped by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding and value propositions.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a startup error UI with diagnostic hints, retry/sign-out actions, and support email generation.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Shows a branded loading screen with a spinner and optional status message during startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds a backend actor with optional admin token init, tracks loading/error states, and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and context management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: React hooks for subscribing to media query changes and detecting mobile layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations including profile fetch with timeouts and error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a dark warm theme with utility enhancements.
frontend/src/lib/authErrors.ts: Helpers to classify auth, timeout, and network errors and generate user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Defines static UI text strings for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, admin panel, and support sections.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Provides helper functions to calculate MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees for deals.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Contains membership access checks and utility functions for feature gating and deal limits.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats and parses USD values between bigint cents and string representations.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Offers support email constants and utilities to generate or open mailto links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for editing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe settings with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays analytics metrics and profit-by-zip data for Enterprise users with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Shows and manages the buyer list for Pro/Enterprise users, including adding and editing buyers with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only contracts manager allowing deal selection, contract uploads, and handling loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying deal metrics, charts, and membership info using fetched deals and user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: AI-powered deal analysis page allowing address input, viewing results, and creating a deal from the analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Pipeline view of deals by stage with permissions, deal creation, and editing via a modal editor.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Membership pricing and upgrade page that loads catalog data and initiates Stripe checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays payment cancellation details with session ID and navigation options back to membership or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles purchase confirmation using the session ID and updates user membership before showing success actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, manage sessionStorage-backed persistence, and retrieve or clear stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, and enabling dark mode with animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file defining schema version, known issues, and existing feature requirements for authentication and profile-loading behavior.
